page.title: 17CUSTOMS
page.content: {KILWINNING}was formerly known as{ {SEGDOUNE or OLD SEGTON.}The name is preserved in the title of the twelve year old girl chosen every year for Kilwinning's week of fun and entertainment-she is the{SEGDOUNE {QUEEN.}The ancient society of {KILWINNING ARCHERS}thought to be the oldest long bow archery club in Britain,have records from 1688.The archers have competed annually in a competition to shoot down a wooden bird or{PAPINGO}from the parapet of the{ABBEY TOWER,}the winner to be the next CAPTAIN and to receive the SILVER ARROW TROPHY for a year. {FREE-MASONS}who belong to the oldest "MOTHER LODGE 0"- the oldest Lodge, and many FREE-MASONS from all over the world join in a procession of FREE-MASONS through the streets on{ {ST.THOMAS'EVE,DECEMBER 21st every year
